alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of Thomas, western Sheridan, southeastern Rawlins and southwestern Decatur Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm outflow winds along a line extending from 12 miles north of Gem to near Colby to 9 miles northwest of Winona. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Gem around 230 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Rexford. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 49 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
